text.autoconfig.connection-utils.title: Connection Utils
If false, turns off all mod's features.
If false, turns off Reconnect Button.

Skips method "client.world.disconnect()" if true.
It means that you will be reconnected immediately, without your character leaving the world.
Better turn off for playing on pirate servers,
as it can produce a error while connecting as "The player with the same nickname is already connected to this server".
If you forgot to turn it off before reconnecting to pirate server and get this error,
try reload your internet connection.
If false, turns off Loading Terrain Fix button.

THIS IS EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE. MAY PRODUCE A LOT OF BUGS.
If true, shows a Multiplayer Menu Opener button.
This button will open server list while you are on server.
It means, that you can connect to multiple servers or even with multiple accounts (requires In-game Account Switcher mod) at one time.
Your player will be AFK while you are playing on another server.
You wont be able to disconnect from server you are not connected to from your client right now from menu.
You need to reload your internet connection for disconnecting from all servers your character on
